definition: to terminate/to cut short/to bring to a stop/to squeeze/to tighten/to damage/variant of 殺|杀[sha1]
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: It is insanity to drive a car without any brakes .
sentences.chinese: 駕駛沒有煞車的汽車確是愚不可及。

sentences.english: With a scream of braking, the life of Yingzi flew up gently.
sentences.chinese: 隨着一陣拔尖的煞車聲，櫻子的一生輕輕地飛了起來。

sentences.english: My car brakes went out on me when I was driving.
sentences.chinese: 我的車子在我開的時候煞車失靈了。

sentences.english: The magnetic field should act as a strong brake on a magnetar's rotation.
sentences.chinese: 磁場對超強磁星體的自轉應該是一種強力的煞車。

sentences.english: With the breaks screeching, Yingzi's life flied in the air gently.
sentences.chinese: 隨着一陣拔尖的煞車聲，櫻子的一生輕輕地飛了起來。

sentences.english: Ventilated construction permits passage of cooling air, to rapidly dissipate heat from the friction shoes.
sentences.chinese: 通風的設計可通過冷卻空氣，迅速散熱的摩擦煞車片。

sentences.english: With the squeak of stopping the car, the life to Ying just fly up lightly.
sentences.chinese: 隨着一陣拔尖的煞車聲，櫻子的一生輕輕地飛了起來。

sentences.english: Do not rub your tire against your brake pads.
sentences.chinese: 不要讓你外胎碰到煞車皮。

sentences.english: With a screech of brakes, Ouko flied lightly and descended slowly on the clammy road like a night butterfly.
sentences.chinese: 隨着一陣拔尖的煞車聲，櫻子的一生輕輕地飛了起來。

sentences.english: The hand-brake lever is worn out.
My feet will slam the brakes, then stopped at the "cross the line penalty, " the white line.
sentences.chinese: 我的腳會踩住煞車，然後停在“越線受罰”的白線上。

sentences.english: When you stop, you leave a mile long skid mark.
sentences.chinese: 當你停車時，煞車痕長達一英里。

sentences.english: Press and hold brake pedal in applied position.
sentences.chinese: 踏下並保持煞車踏板在使用位置。

sentences.english: With a screech of an abrupt stop, Yingzi's life flew off softly.
sentences.chinese: 隨着一陣拔尖的煞車聲，櫻子的一生輕輕地飛了起來。

sentences.english: They must not be confused with the rear lights which are also red.
sentences.chinese: 切勿把煞車燈與紅色車尾燈混淆。

sentences.english: He stepped on the brake, and suddenly the car started to slide on the slick pavement.
sentences.chinese: 他踩下煞車，汽車忽然開始在光滑的路面上滑行起來。

definition: to reduce speed/to slow down/to take it easy
